original_title: Uno a me, uno a te e uno a Raffaele
overview: An American independent director comes to Italy to shoot a film. But inconveniences and obstacles stand in the way at every step. These are the years in which “Tangentopoli” rages and the golden rule of officials and collaborators is “one (bribe) to you, one to me, one to Raffaele”.
title: Uno a me, uno a te e uno a Raffaele
